Package com.mySTARS.Entities

Class SystemBackend

java.lang.Object
com.mySTARS.Entities.SystemBackend
public class SystemBackend
extends java.lang.Object
SystemBackend class acts like a database for us, holding all our temporary data and carrying out and handling the implementation for most of our code

    • addLessonToExistingIndex

      public static void addLessonToExistingIndex​(java.lang.String currentCourseCode, int index, DAY day, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String group, java.lang.String location, WEEK lessonWeeks, java.lang.String remarks, java.lang.String startTime, java.lang.String endTime)
      Method to add lesson to existing index
      Parameters:
      currentCourseCode - Holds courseCode of specific course
      index - Holds index number
      day - Holds day in which lesson is held
      type - Holds type of lesson
      group - Holds group code / name of lesson
      location - Holds lesson location
      lessonWeeks - Holds weeks that lesson is held on
      remarks - Holds additional remarks that admin user wants to tag to that course
      startTime - Holds start time of lesson
      endTime - Holds end time of lesson
